tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy.context: Tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy and Left superficial nasal cauterization.

Left superficial nasal cauterization.context: A nasal endoscope was used to identify the plexus of bleeding, which was predominantly on the left mid portion of the septum that was controlled with broad superficial cauterization using a suction cautery device.

Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with.context: Final Diagnoses: 2. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith.

Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurre.context: Final Diagnoses: 3. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

tonsillectomy.context: The hypertrophic tonsils were then removed by the suction and snare.

adenoidectomy.context: The adenoids were shaved back, flushed with prevertebral fascia with curette.

Afrin.context: Afrin was instilled in both sides of the nose and allowed to take effect for a period of time.

Xylocaine with epinephrine.context: An additional control was established by infiltrating slowly with a 1% Xylocaine with epinephrine around the perimeter of the bleeding site and then cauterizing the bleeding site itself.

Lortab.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.

amoxicillin.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.

Ponaris nose drops.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.

epistaxis.context: Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

McIvor mouth gag.context: The McIvor mouth gag was inserted and gently suspended.

endotracheal intubation.context: The patient was brought to the operating room. Endotracheal intubation carried out by Dr. X.

Dr. X.context: The patient was brought to the operating room. Endotracheal intubation carried out by Dr. X.

nasopharynx.context: An inspection of the nasopharynx confirmed that the adenoids were in fact hypertrophic rubbery cryptic and obstructive.

packing.context: Bleeding was minimal and controlled with packing followed by electrocautery followed by extensive additional irrigation.

clots.context: The oropharynx was reinspected, clots removed, the patient was extubated, taken to the recovery room in stable condition.
